EmailTemplate.name: NSS Engine Rental Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Help Improve Our Services, Provide Us With Your Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
Thank you for your business!
As a customer who recently contacted Honeywell Engine Rental Support, we would like to know your views on that experience and the impression of Honeywell we gave you. Your feedback is welcome and highly valued, whether positive, neutral or negative. It will help us to understand what is most valuable to you in shaping our products and services in the future.
Case #: CASE-16583522 Created on: 6/3/2019 Case Origin: Email Case Owner: Radha Kiran Kamavaramelluru Customer PO/RO/WO Number: Subject: Test case 12 in QA - Please ignore
{!Case.NSS_Survey_Link__c}
We appreciate your business,
Honeywell Aerospace Honeywell Engine Rental Support
{!Case.Thread_Id}
If you prefer not to receive future survey invitations, click here to opt out.
